text: Usale bhan'yoh mala'i ta yi sabai mero aphno vyaktigata jnanako karana prapta bha'eko cha. Ke usala'i thaha chaina, ki allahale usabhanda agadi kaiyan bastiharula'i nasta garisakeko cha, jo saktima usabhanda badhi ra usabhanda adhika dhana sampativala thi'e? Ra aparadhiharusita ta unako aparadhaharuko barema yasto bela sodhapucha garidaina
